workflow.name: ‚úçÔ∏è Blog image SEO & size auditor with Ghost and Google Sheets
workflow.description: ***Tags**: Ghost CMS, SEO Audit, Image Optimisation, Alt Text, Google Sheets, Automation* ### Context Hi! I‚Äôm [Samir](https://samirsaci.com) ‚Äî a Supply Chain Engineer and Data Scientist based in Paris, and founder of [LogiGreen Consulting](https://logi-green.com). I help companies and content creators use automation and analytics to **improve visibility**, **enhance performance**, and **reduce manual work**. > Let‚Äôs use n8n to automate SEO audits to increase your traffic! üì¨ For business inquiries, feel free to connect on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/samir-saci) ### Who is this template for? This workflow is perfect for **bloggers, marketers, or content teams** using **Ghost CMS** who want to: - Extract and review **all images** from articles - Detect missing or short **alt texts** - Check image **file size** and **filename SEO compliance** - Push the audit results into a **Google Sheet** [![Example of Results](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/size/w1600/2025/06/image-24.png)]((https://bit.ly/playlist-n8n-supplyscience)) ### How does it work? This n8n workflow extracts all blog posts from Ghost CMS, scans the HTML to collect all embedded images, then evaluates each image for: - ‚úÖ Presence and length of `alt text` - üìè File size in kilobytes - üî§ Filename SEO quality (e.g. lowercase, hyphenated, no special chars) All findings are written to Google Sheets for **further analysis** or **manual cleanup**. ### üß≠ Workflow Steps: 1. üöÄ Trigger the workflow manually or on schedule 2. üì∞ Extract blog post content from Ghost CMS 3. üñºÔ∏è Parse all `` tags with `src` and `alt` attributes 4. üì§ Store image metadata in a Google Sheet (step 1) 5. üåê Download each image using HTTP request 6. üßÆ Extract file size, extension, and filename SEO flag 7. üìÑ Update the audit sheet with size and format insights [![Workflow](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/size/w1600/2025/06/image-25.png)]((https://bit.ly/playlist-n8n-supplyscience)) ### What do I need to get started? This workflow requires: - A **Ghost Content API key** - A **Google Sheet** (to log audit results) - No AI or external APIs required ‚Äî works fully with built-in nodes - ### üì∫ Learn More with n8n Tutorials Get hands-on experience with automation through my comprehensive **n8n tutorial playlist**, featuring 18+ complete, step-by-step videos and ready-to-use templates. [![n8n Playlist](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/size/w1600/2025/11/image-9.png)](https://bit.ly/playlist-n8n-supplyscience) ### Next Steps üóíÔ∏è Follow the sticky notes inside the workflow to: - Plug in your Ghost blog credentials - Select or create a Google Sheet - Run the audit and start improving your SEO! *This template was built using n8n v1.93.0* *Submitted: June 8, 2025*

parameters.content:
### 2. Extract Blog Posts Content
The Ghost node extracts all the posts of your blog with content and metadata. In the second node, we extract description, URL, content and features image url.

#### How to setup?
- **Ghost Account API**:
   1. Add your Ghost Blog Account Credentials
   2. Select the number of Blog Posts you want to collect
  [Learn more about the Ghost Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.ghost)

### 1. Workflow Trigger
This workflow uses simple trigger.

#### How to setup?
*Nothing to do.*

### 3. First Loop to Collect Images
We loop through all the articles extracted by the Ghost Node. For each article, this section will collect all the images of the article with their **image_url** and **alt_text**. The results will be recorded in a **Google Sheet**.

#### How to setup?
- **Record Long Break in the Google Sheet Node**:
   1. Add your Google Sheet API credentials to access the Google Sheet file
   2. Select the file using the list, an URL or an ID
   3. Select the sheet in which you want to record the images information
   4. Map the fields: **article_id**, **article_Title**, **article_url**, **image_url**, **alt_text**, **file_size_kb**, **format**, **filename_seo**
  [Learn more about the Google Sheet Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googlesheets)

### 4. Second Loop to Extract Image Information
We loop through all the images in the article, for each image we **download** the content using the **HTTP request** node to record **image_size** in kilobytes and **image_name** in a Google Sheet. If the image size is higher than **500 kb**, it is flagged as **not ok**.
#### How to setup?
- **Record Image File Name and Size**:
   1. Add your Google Sheet API credentials to access the Google Sheet file
   2. Select the file using the list, an URL or an ID
   3. Select the sheet in which you want to record the images information
  [Learn more about the Google Sheet Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googlesheets)
